name: vsts-chef-task-env
description: Set the cookbook version constraint on the named Chef environment.  Optionally add attributes to the environment from the release environment
author: Russell Seymour

inputs.name: chefServerEndpoint
inputs.label: Chef Server Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Chef Server Endpoint to use.

inputs.name: chefEnvName
inputs.label: Chef Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the environment to modify

inputs.name: chefCookbookName
inputs.label: Cookbook Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of cookbook that will be version pinned in the environment

inputs.name: chefCookbookVersion
inputs.label: Cookbook Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the cookbook to pin.

inputs.name: addEnvironmentAttributes
inputs.label: Add Environment attributes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add Release environment variables to the Chef environment.

inputs.name: chefEnvironmentNamespace
inputs.label: Chef Environment Namespace
inputs.helpMarkDown: Top level namespace for the attributes on the Chef Environment, e.g. where release vars will be placed under
